FareBiz Games Pvt Ltd is a company registered under Companies Act 1956. The company deals in online skill gaming through mobile app. It is quiz contest for the people who love to play online games and want to try their skill for winning award and reward. The company is incorporated to fulfill the dreams of the peopleâ€™s fun and exciting skill games . It is all about the skill and knowledge which can create a fair opportunity to win among many others. Download, register, pay, answer and win. Come try your skill and trust on us and we can give back in unimaginable multiples.

Mission: To give a fair chance to all for improving his/her life by using the general skill.

Responsibility: To give back the maximum who create trust on us.

Integrity: Honest, fair, transparent and ethical.
